Transition to Net Zero – A Practical Guide for Businesses

A hands-on masterclass guiding businesses through practical Net Zero strategies, carbon management, and sustainable operations.

Course Overview

A practical masterclass to achieve Net Zero goals.

This workshop equips businesses with actionable strategies, tools, and frameworks to reduce carbon emissions and align operations with Net Zero commitments.

What You Need

Laptop for exercises, organisational energy and emissions data (if available), and basic familiarity with sustainability principles.

Key Takeaways

Participants will leave with carbon reduction strategies, reporting templates, stakeholder engagement plans, and actionable steps to implement Net Zero within their organisation.
